oa_service.oa_service_name: Oracle Process Manager for {{ db_name }}_{{ db_host }}

oa_service.start_cmd: {{ app_run_dir }}/EBSapps/comn/util/jdk32/jre/bin/java -ms128m -mx256m -classpath .:{{ app_run_dir }}/EBSapps/comn/shared-libs/ebs-3rdparty/WEB-INF/lib/ebs3rdpartyManifest.jar:{{ app_run_dir }}/FMW_Home/Oracle_EBS-app1/shared-libs/ebs-fmw/WEB-INF/lib/ebsFMWManifest.jar:{{ app_run_dir }}/FMW_Home/Oracle_EBS-app1/shared-libs/ebs-appsborg/WEB-INF/lib/ebsAppsborgManifest.jar:{{ app_run_dir }}/FMW_Home/oracle_common/modules/oracle.uix_11.1.1/uix2.jar:{{ app_run_dir }}/EBSapps/comn/java/classes:{{ app_run_dir }}/EBSapps/comn/java/classes/3rdparty/RFJavaInt.zip -Dengine.LogPath={{ app_run_dir }}/inst/apps/{{ db_name }}_{{ db_host }}/logs/appl/admin/log -Dengine.TempDir={{ app_run_dir }}/inst/apps/{{ db_name }}_{{ db_host }}/temp -Dengine.CommandPromptEnabled=false -Dengine.CommandPort=9300 -Dengine.AOLJ.config={{ app_run_dir }}/inst/apps/{{ db_name }}_{{ db_host }}/appl/fnd/12.0.0/secure/{{ db_name }}.dbc -Dengine.ServerID=5000 -Ddebug=off -Dengine.LogLevel=1 -Dlog.ShowWarnings=false -Dengine.FaxEnabler=oracle.apps.jtf.fm.engine.rightfax.RfFaxEnablerImpl -Dengine.PrintEnabler=oracle.apps.jtf.fm.engine.rightfax.RfPrintEnablerImpl -Dfax.TempDir={{ app_run_dir }}/inst/apps/{{ db_name }}_{{ db_host }}/logs/appl/admin/log -Dprint.TempDir={{ app_run_dir }}/inst/apps/{{ db_name }}_{{ db_host }}/logs/appl/admin/log -Dengine.ServerInstanceID=5000 -DTurnOffLowPriorityMonitor=no -Dengine.MaxBatchThreads=12 oracle.apps.jtf.fm.FulfillmentServer >> {{ app_run_dir }}/inst/apps/{{ db_name }}_{{ db_host }}/logs/appl/admin/log/jtffmctl.txt

oa_service_group.title: Web Application Services
oa_service_group.services: oacore, forms, oafm, forms-c4ws, oaea, tns_apps
